DOC.brief_summary: To compare the sequential administration of exemestane with administration of further tamoxifen until 5 years in postmenopausal women with operable breast cancer who have already received 2-3 years of adjuvant tamoxifen, in terms of disease-free survival (DFS), overall survival (OS), incidence of contralateral breast cancer and long-term tolerability.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Of Exemestane Versus Continued Tamoxifen In Postmenopausal Women With Early Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: postmenopausal women with histologically or cytologically confirmed primary breast adenocarcinoma, receiving tamoxifen and have been treated with tamoxifen continuously for between 2 and 3 years and one month, and still free of disease unresectable breast cancer ER negative primary tumor
